verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, which \w teacheth|strong="H3925"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w war|strong="H7128"\w*, \add and\add* my \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* to \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*:\f + \fr 144.1 \ft strength: Heb. rock\f*\f + \fr 144.1 \ft to war…: Heb. to the war, etc\f*

My \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*; my high \w tower|strong="H4869"\w*, and my \w deliverer|strong="H6403"\w*; my \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, and \add he\add* in whom I \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*; who \w subdueth|strong="H7286"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* under me.\f + \fr 144.2 \ft My goodness: or, My mercy\f*

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, what \add is\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, that thou takest \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of him! \add or\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, that thou makest \w account|strong="H2803"\w* of him!

\w Man|strong="H0120"\w* is \w like|strong="H1819"\w* to \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*: his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add are\add* as a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* that passeth \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w Bow|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and they shall \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w*.

Cast \w forth|strong="H1299"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*, and \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them: shoot \w out|strong="H7971"\w* thine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H2000"\w* them.

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from \w above|strong="H4791"\w*; \w rid|strong="H6475"\w* me, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me out of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*;\f + \fr 144.7 \ft hand from: Heb. hands from\f*

Whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and their right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \add is\add* a right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.

I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* unto thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: upon a \w psaltery|strong="H5035"\w* \add and\add* an instrument of ten \w strings|strong="H6218"\w* will I sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto thee.

\add It is he\add* that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* unto \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: who \w delivereth|strong="H6475"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* from the \w hurtful|strong="H7451"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 144.10 \ft salvation: or, victory\f*

\w Rid|strong="H6475"\w* me, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and their right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \add is\add* a right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*:

That our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add may be\add* as \w plants|strong="H5195"\w* grown \w up|strong="H1431"\w* in their \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*; \add that\add* our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \add may be\add* as corner \w stones|strong="H2106"\w*, \w polished|strong="H2404"\w* \add after\add* the \w similitude|strong="H8403"\w* of a \w palace|strong="H1964"\w*:\f + \fr 144.12 \ft polished: Heb. cut\f*

\add That\add* our \w garners|strong="H4200"\w* \add may be\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w*, \w affording|strong="H6329"\w* all manner of \w store|strong="H2177"\w*: \add that\add* our \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* may bring forth \w thousands|strong="H0503"\w* and ten \w thousands|strong="H7231"\w* in our \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*:\f + \fr 144.13 \ft all…: Heb. from kind to kind\f*

\add That\add* our \w oxen|strong="H0441"\w* \add may be\add* strong to \w labour|strong="H5445"\w*; \add that there be\add* no breaking \w in|strong="H6556"\w*, nor going \w out|strong="H3318"\w*; that \add there be\add* no \w complaining|strong="H6682"\w* in our \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*.\f + \fr 144.14 \ft strong…: Heb. able to bear burdens, or, loaden with flesh\f*

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is that\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that is in such a \w case|strong="H3602"\w*: \add yea\add*, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is that\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, whose \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
